de.iabg.mode
Class ModeMatrix

java.lang.Object
  de.iabg.math.AbstractMatrix
      de.iabg.math.RectangularMatrix
          de.iabg.mode.ModeMatrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
Matrix
public class ModeMatrix
extends RectangularMatrix

This Matrix is designed to store the mode shape coordinates of a given mode shape matrix. This matrix has several convenience methods that wrap methods from RectangularMatrix. The modes are stored as rows and the x, y, z coordinates of each node are stored as fixed columns. This matrix also has the ability to correlate and connect itself with another ModeMatrix. A correlation compares all modes of this matrix with all modes of another matrix, while a connection specifies a mapping between modes from this matrix and another matrix. There are a few types of correlations implemented in this class, a dot product correlation, a Modal Assurance Criterion correlation, and an Orthogonality Check correlation. This class also adds storage for the frequencies of each mode. This means that some of the methods defined in RectangularMatrix must be overridden to include changes to this data.

Version:
September 13, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE

Method Detail

clear

public void clear()
Removes the data from this matrix. This method overrides the existing implementation to also clear the mode frequencies.

Specified by:
clear in interface Matrix
Overrides:
clear in class RectangularMatrix

computeDotProduct

public ModeCorrelationMatrix computeDotProduct(ModeMatrix modes)
Computes a matrix of the dot products of each mode in this ModeMatrix and the given ModeMatrix. The modes of this matrix are the rows of the returned ModeCorrelationMatrix, while the modes of the given matrix are the columns.

Parameters:
modes - the ModeMatrix that will be correlated to this ModeMatrix
Returns:
the matrix of the dot product correlation

computeGeneralizedMass

public ModeCorrelationMatrix computeGeneralizedMass(MassMatrix masses,
                                                    ModeMatrix modes)
Computes a matrix of the generalized mass of each mode in this ModeMatrix and the given ModeMatrix. The required MassMatrix is for the First Mode and should have the same node names for the calculation to successfully compute. The modes of this matrix are the rows of the returned ModeCorrelationMatrix, while the modes of the given matrix are the columns.

Parameters:
masses - the MassMatrix for the First Mode
modes - the ModeMatrix that will be correlated to this ModeMatrix
Returns:
the matrix of the generalized mass correlation

computeModalAssuranceCriterion

public ModeCorrelationMatrix computeModalAssuranceCriterion(ModeMatrix modes)
Computes a matrix of the Modal Assurance Criterion of each mode in this ModeMatrix and the given ModeMatrix. The modes of this matrix are the rows of the returned ModeCorrelationMatrix, while the modes of the given matrix are the columns.

Parameters:
modes - the ModeMatrix that will be correlated to this ModeMatrix
Returns:
the matrix of the Modal Assurance Criterion correlation

computeOrthogonalityCheck

public ModeCorrelationMatrix computeOrthogonalityCheck(MassMatrix masses,
                                                       ModeMatrix modes)
Computes a matrix of the normalized Orthogonality Check of each mode in this ModeMatrix and the given ModeMatrix. The required MassMatrix is for the First Mode and should have the same node names for the calculation to successfully compute. The modes of this matrix are the rows of the returned ModeCorrelationMatrix, while the modes of the given matrix are the columns.

Parameters:
masses - the MassMatrix for the First Mode
modes - the ModeMatrix that will be correlated to this ModeMatrix
Returns:
the matrix of the normalized Orthogonality Check correlation

getReducedDotProduct

public ModeCorrelationMatrix getReducedDotProduct(ModeMatrix modes,
                                                  KeyList firstModeKeys,
                                                  KeyList firstNodeKeys,
                                                  KeyList lastModeKeys,
                                                  KeyList lastNodeKeys)
Makes a copy of this ModeMatrix and the given one, sorts each by the corresponding given mode names and node names, and computes the resulting ModeCorrelationMatrix from computeDotProduct(de.iabg.mode.ModeMatrix).

Parameters:
modes - the ModeMatrix that will be correlated to this ModeMatrix
firstModeKeys - the new order of the modes of this matrix
firstNodeKeys - the new order of the nodes of this matrix
lastModeKeys - the new order of the modes of the given matrix
lastNodeKeys - the new order of the nodes of the given matrix
Returns:
the matrix of the dot product correlation

                                                       ModeMatrix modes,
                                                       KeyList firstModeKeys,

                                                       KeyList lastNodeKeys)

Returns:
the matrix of the generalized mass correlation

sortRows

public void sortRows(KeyList rowKeys)
Sorts and resizes the number of rows in this matrix according to the order of the given row names. This method overrides the previous implementation to include the mode frequencies. The number of given row names may be smaller than the number of row names in this matrix, thus reducing the number of rows. The number of given row names may also contain duplicate values, thus increasing the number of rows. The corresponding cells of the given rows are also sorted in the same way. The data of any row which is omitted will be lost.

Overrides:
sortRows in class RectangularMatrix
Parameters:
rowKeys - the new order of the row names

swapColumns

public void swapColumns(int firstIndex,
                        int lastIndex)
This method does nothing and overrides the previous implementation because the columns (coordinates) should not swapped.

Overrides:
swapColumns in class RectangularMatrix
Parameters:
firstIndex - the first column index
lastIndex - the last column index

swapRows

public void swapRows(int firstIndex,
                     int lastIndex)
Swaps the data and names of the rows at the given indices. This method overrides the previous implementation to include the mode frequencies.

Overrides:
swapRows in class RectangularMatrix
Parameters:
firstIndex - the first row index
lastIndex - the last row index
